SELECT p.id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.origin_name AS originName, p.content, p.price, p.image_url AS imageUrl, CASE WHEN w.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isWished, COALESCE(r.avg_rating, 0.0) AS averageRating, COALESCE(r.review_count, 0) AS reviewCount FROM Bg_AI_recommendation rec INNER JOIN Bg_Product p ON rec.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN Bg_Wishlist w ON w.product_id = p.id AND w.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM Bg_Review GROUP BY product_id ) r ON r.product_id = p.id WHERE rec.user_id = #{userId} AND (rec.expired_at IS NULL OR rec.expired_at > datetime('now')) ORDER BY rec.score DESC, rec.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{limit}
